feed.title: Mark's Documentation Site
feed.subtitle: This is a site I've created to help document various projects like my homelab as well as some other hobbies and interests I may want to write about. Topics could range from homelabbing and self hosting various services, recipes I'm interested in cooking / backyard bbq and possibly even a bit of amateur blacksmithing.
